name: GrpWithZero.coe_id
decl: lemma coe_id {X : GrpWithZero} : (ùüô X : X ‚Üí X) = id := rfl

name: GrpWithZero.coe_comp
initialProofState:

decl: lemma coe_comp {X Y Z : GrpWithZero} {f : X ‚ü∂ Y} {g : Y ‚ü∂ Z} : (f ‚â´ g : X ‚Üí Z) = g ‚àò f := rfl

name: GrpWithZero.forget_map
initialProofState:
X Y : GrpWithZero
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.forget GrpWithZero).map f) ‚áëf
decl:
@[simp] lemma forget_map {X Y : GrpWithZero} (f : X ‚ü∂ Y) :
  (forget GrpWithZero).map f = f := rfl

name: GrpWithZero.Iso.mk_hom
initialProofState:
Œ± Œ≤ : GrpWithZero
e : MulEquiv ‚ÜëŒ± ‚ÜëŒ≤
‚ä¢ Eq (GrpWithZero.Iso.mk e).hom ‚Üëe
decl:
/-- Constructs an isomorphism of groups with zero from a group isomorphism between them. -/
@[simps]
def Iso.mk {Œ± Œ≤ : GrpWithZero.{u}} (e : Œ± ‚âÉ* Œ≤) : Œ± ‚âÖ Œ≤ where
  hom := (e : Œ± ‚Üí*‚ÇÄ Œ≤)
  inv := (e.symm : Œ≤ ‚Üí*‚ÇÄ Œ±)
  hom_inv_id := by
    ext
    exact e.symm_apply_apply _
  inv_hom_id := by
    ext
    exact e.apply_symm_apply _
